owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Reviewer,

Greetings!!

Thank you for a wonderful review on TripAdvisor.

I am delighted to note that you have had an enjoyable stay and it was a pleasure to have been of service to you. Our endeavor is to provide attentive and personalized service and it is great to know that you were impressed with our service delivery.

Thank you once again for your compliments and we look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back soon for another memorable visit.

Warm regards,

Vikram Tanwar
General Manager
owner_response.author: Vikram Tanwar

data.text:
The room was clean and comfortable to stay. The window view was nice. Staff were very careful and responsive!
We could order the food and it was delivered to our room very fast. The food was delicious, very tasty (but sometimes a little bit spicy)
The location is good, there is a bus station near the hotel, so we could easy go to Abu Dhabi and to the beach. The metro station is in 2 min walk from the hotel - it‚Äôs very comfy!
Many thanks Anuj Rohit Yadav for help with getting Burj Khalifa and desert safari tickets!!)
To sum up, we were enjoyed staying at this hotel, so I actually recommend you Wescott Hotel!
data.title: This hotel and its service surprised us!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Reviewer,

Thank you very much for posting your views about your experience at Wescott Hotel, Dubai.

I am delighted to note that you have had an enjoyable stay and it was a pleasure to have been of service to you. It is feedback such as yours which motivates the entire team to continue striving for excellence. 

Thank you once again for staying with us and the team and I hope that Wescott Hotel, Dubai remains your preferred residence on all your future visits to experience another enriching stay.

Warm regards,

Vikram Tanwar
General Manager
owner_response.author: Vikram Tanwar

data.text: Variety of beer,we often visit this bar on ground floor. Very pleasant vibe specifically server name bipana she was very attentive and helpful she make sure if we are okay or need anything. Price friendly as well as enthusiastic place highly recommended must visit.
data.title: Exceptional service good vibes great experience

Greetings!!!

Our endeavor is to provide exemplary service to all our guests and we are glad to learn that we could create a comfortable and relaxing experience for you. Your warm words of praise have been shared with the entire team and we are all extremely delighted to read your feedback.

Vikram Tanwar

data.text:
Your staff are your real assets must say namely Mr.Ratandeep at reception who won our hearts & Mr.Vikram Tanwar, they both were extremely courteous and helpful.They really went the extra mile to make our stay comfortable & a memorable one.

Ms.Binu and Ms.Sonila @ Fatfrogs bar really made my 11yr old daughter so comfortable wth their love and affection.

great job guys‚Ä¶kudos to the entire team under the guidance & leadership of Mr.Tanwar @ wescott hotels dubaiüëç

data.text:
We had a comfortable stay with escort hotel and we will truly be back whenever we will come in Dubai. This is finest stay was ever. There you can get everything in nearby like city center bus station and Metro Station too. 

There was Anuj and his team Specially Pramila in perfect gesture and helpfull.
